titles.title: Mortgage Cancellation Relief Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income of individual taxpayers discharges of indebtedness attributable to certain forgiven residential mortgage obligations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/11/2003--Introduced. Mortgage Cancellation Relief Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income amounts attributable to the discharge of certain residential mortgage obligations.
